fields.summary: Stop the RSM after closing the remote-log reader threads to handle requests gracefully
fields.description:
During shutdown, when the RemoteStorageManager closes first, then the ongoing requests are thrown with error. To handle the ongoing requests gracefully, closing the RSM after closing the remote-log reader thread pools. 

 

https://sourcegraph.com/github.com/apache/kafka/-/blob/storage/src/main/java/org/apache/kafka/server/log/remote/storage/RemoteLogManager.java?L2035
